name: Heartbeats (Emmanuel Ah-kouen, Cedric Stoquer)
description:
Woke up in an obscure environment, you are looking for your loved one. Follow your heartbeats and you will find the answers.

Use the ARROW keys in order to navigate.

==========================================

Made by Emmanuel Ah-kouen for Brackeys Game Jam 2.
Special thanks to Cedric Stoquer for the soundtrack.

==========================================

Changelog:

* Added MacOS build
* Added WebGL build
